trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 하는 경우 사용자 주석을 쓰고 읽기 위한 데이터 저장소를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: 새로 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> 저장소에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>저장소에 추가 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>속성을 새 값으로 설정 되어 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: When AddAnnotation is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: AddAnnotation를 호출할 때 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>속성을 검사 하는 경우 참조 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>스토어로 이미 추가 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>개가 추가 되 고 저장소에 이미 (기준으로 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>속성)는 <xref:System.ArgumentException>오류가 throw 됩니다.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: 저장소에 추가할 주석입니다.

trans-unit.source: newAnnotation is .
trans-unit.target: newAnnotationis .

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> 동일한 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>속성 값이 저장소에 이미 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>저장소에 호출 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: 때 앵커가 발생 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> 저장소 변경에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AnchorChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: 주석이 변경 내용을 모니터링할 AnchorChanged 이벤트를 사용할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>각에 등록할 필요가 없는 매장에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>개별적으로.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: 때 제작자 발생 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> 저장소 변경에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>주석 변경 내용을 모니터링할 이벤트를 사용할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>각에 등록할 필요가 없는 매장에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>개별적으로.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: 주석 버퍼의에서 데이터를 실제 데이터 저장소에 즉시 쓸지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 명시적 저장 모델을 사용 하는 응용 프로그램을 AutoFlush를 설정할 수 `false` 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>직접 적절 한.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: 암시적 저장 모델을 사용 하는 응용 프로그램을 AutoFlush를 설정할 수 `true` 시킬 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>모든 저장 작업 후 자동으로 호출 됩니다 (추가, 삭제 또는 수정).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>주석 버퍼의에서 데이터는 각 작업에 대 한 실제 데이터 저장소에 즉시 쓸지를 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 주석 버퍼의에서 데이터를 기록 되는 응용 프로그램 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*> 를 명시적으로 호출 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Cargo 때 발생 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> 저장소 변경에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CargoChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: 주석이 변경 내용을 모니터링할 CargoChanged 이벤트를 사용할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>각에 등록할 필요가 없는 매장에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>개별적으로.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석을 삭제 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>저장소에서.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>삭제할 주석의 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: 삭제 된; 주석 그렇지 않으면 경우 지정 된 주석을 annotationId 저장소에서 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>저장소에 호출 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: 저장소에서 사용 되는 스레드와 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 모두 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Applications should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> 끝나면 Dispose를 호출 해야

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출한 후 응용 프로그램에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>가비지 수집기가 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>차지한.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 공용 Dispose 메서드 호출 보호 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> `(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 의 매개 변수 `true` 모든 스레드와 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >에 대 한 마지막 참조 하기 전에 삭제 호출는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>해제 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출 하지 않은 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>가비지 수집기는 저장소를 호출할 때까지 리소스가 해제 되지 것입니다 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 저장소에서 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 하 고 선택적으로 관리 되는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This protected Dispose method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 이 보호 된 공용 메서드는 Dispose <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 공용 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>보호 된 Dispose를 호출`(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>Dispose를 호출 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, Dispose releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수는 `true`, Dispose 릴리스 관리 되는 모든 리소스를 보유 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Dispose also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출 또한는 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>이 저장소에 대해 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 재정의 자료 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call Finalize directly.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 Finalize를 직접 호출 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Finalize is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 마무리 호출 하 여 사용 하지 않도록 설정 하지 않으면 가비지 수집 중 자동으로 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Finalize 메서드 및 소멸자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), 및 [Finalize 메서드를 재정의](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: 기본 저장 장치에 쓰여지도록 내부 버퍼에 유지 된 모든 주석 데이터를 강제로 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call Flush directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 명시적 저장 모델을 사용 하는 응용 프로그램을 설정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>를 `false` 적절 한 경우 플러시를 직접 호출 하 고.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause Flush to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: 암시적 저장 모델을 사용 하는 응용 프로그램을 설정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>를 `true` 모든 저장 작업 후 자동으로 호출 되는 플러시 되도록 (추가, 삭제 또는 수정).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>저장소에 호출 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석을 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>저장소에서.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>반환할 주석의 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given annotationId; or , if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: 있는 주석을 주어진 annotationId ; 또는 경우 지정 된 주석을 annotationId 저장소에서 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>저장소에 호출 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: 저장소에 있는 모든 주석의 목록을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: 현재는 저장소에 포함 된 모든 주석의 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>저장소에 호출 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> with locators that begin with a matching <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence.
trans-unit.target: 포함 하는 주석 목록을 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>짝이 되는로 시작 하는 로케이터가 있는 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> 시퀀스.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>

trans-unit.source: This GetAnnotations method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: 이 GetAnnotations 메서드 내부적으로 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>클래스를 검색 하 고 반환할 주석을 대 한 일치 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: 시작 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> 에 대 한 일치 하는 주석을 반환할 시퀀스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have with locators that start and match the given anchorLocator; otherwise, if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: 포함 하는 주석 목록은 시작 하 고 일치 하는 로케이터가 있는 주어진 anchorLocator , 그렇지 않으면 일치 하는 주석이 없는 경우.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>호출한.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>호출 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> 추가 되거나 저장소에서 삭제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: 에 대해 동기화 잠금으로 사용할 개체를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> 임계 영역입니다.
